title: Destiny 2
description: Dive into the world of Destiny 2 to explore the mysteries of the solar system and experience responsive first-person shooter combat. An Immersive Story You are a Guardian, defender of the Last City of humanity in a solar system under siege by infamous villains. Look to the stars and stand against the darkness. Your legend begins now. Guardian Classes Choose from the armored Titan, mystic Warlock, or swift Hunter. Cooperative and Competitive Multiplayer Play with or against your friends and other Guardians in various PvE and PvP game modes. Exotic Weapons and Armor Thousands of weapons, millions of options. Discover new gear combinations and define your own personal style. The hunt for the perfect arsenal begins.
notes: Users responsible for fees for broadband internet, which is required.
